name: Circulus
description:
Meet the vertinginous puzzle Circulus! Invert levels upside down to gain aim! You will meet majority of various kinds of spheres, barries and helpful items at huge types of different levels in three unique worlds!

The gameplay will never be monotonus! Different tasks and puzzles are waiting for you with lots of objects to be collected, transferred or destroyed!

Amaze with:
•90 unique levels;
•Different conditions of finish each level and challenges;
•Original intuitive gameplay;
•Different types of spheres, blackholes, magnets and even bombs;
•Three wonderful worlds.
